(Uhhh, yeah...Darkfate is in Brotherhood territory in the Gobi Desert in 
Mongolia.  They are attacking the Ramora, one of the Brotherhood's bases.  
The same base Hell Beast happens to be in.  So, the Brotherhood sees it as 
Darkfate making war against the Brotherhood)
